<title level="1" right="Trait">[Vigilante](/Traits.aspx?ID=803)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 218 <sup>1.1</sup>

Your class feats and [vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=267) feats are associated with your vigilante identity, and using them while in your social identity may risk exposing you as a vigilante. If your identity is exposed to the public, you lose the benefits of [Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6424) to disguising yourself, but you can spend 1 week of [downtime](/Rules.aspx?ID=2008) to create a new social identity.
